Title: Go among the workers, peasants and soldiers and into the thick of struggle!
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Export posters like this one, with Western subtitles, were shipped to Europe and the United States in large numbers, and distributed by Maoist groups there. They were very popular among left-wing students. The man on the left looks very much like Chen Yonggui, leader of the agricultural model village Dazhai.The woman has a booklet in her pocket: Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art (在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话).This poster was originally published May 1970 by the Shanghai Publishing Revolution Group (上海市出版革命组出版, Shanghaishi chuban gemingzu, print nr. 3-57(1)24).
Tags: Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art
在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话
